item.title: EcoQuants website launched with free hosting and interactive visualizations
item.description: The website EcoQuants is alive and ticking! Here’s what I’m using in order to host it for free and still contain dynamic content: Github Pages: hosting for free, and files versioned using git blogdown: R package to use the fast Hugo templating engine hugo-theme-bootstrap4-blog: latest Bootstrap applied to Hugo template boostrap4-carousel: baked this into the index page htmlwidgets Power of d3 JS ported to single R functions to provide interactive experience from static web files.
